============
SMI_analysis
============

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/gfreychet/smi_analysis.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/gfreychet/smi_analysis

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/smi_analysis.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/smi_analysis


Scientific python for data analysis at the Soft matter Interface beamline at NSLS-II

* Free software: 3-clause BSD license
* Documentation: (COMING SOON!) https://gfreychet.github.io/smi_analysis.
